name: DUSTNET (itch)
description:
DUSTNET is the last remaining de_dust2 server, join an asymmetrical cross-platform deathmatch as a COMPUTER, VIRTUAL REALITY, or AUGMENTED REALITY player.

Play the mobile AR companion app for free!

                                 

Features

  • Play as a COMPUTER, VIRTUAL REALITY, or AUGMENTED REALITY player and join DUSTNET, each platform is its own unique player type in this experimental multiplayer server.
  • Keep the de_dust2 server from collapsing, unlock bhop, noclip, teleport, and other admin commands.
  • Work with your VR & AR friends to edit the map and mod the gamemode, choose to be a competitive or cooperative player.

This project collides a two decade old first person shooter with VR and AR technology. DUSTNET is an experiment in cross-platform design and videogame culture - set amongst the most recognizable and resilient virtual space, de_dust2.
